name: Casino Zyngo
description:
-------------------------How to play----------------------

The game is based on casino mixed with slot machine, made in PixiJS. The objective is to finish all rounds with the highest score.

Every board you recieve have 3  multipliers. if you found the spider your multiplier get reduced by 1. If you found the 2x multiplier your multiplier increase by 1, up to the max of 3. During the game you will spot some arrows to help you notice where the multipliers bonus might be.

If you finish some row/ column or cross you will recieve a bonus score.

Also have some green slots randomly in your board, completing all those slots will make you win the greatest combo score.

Every round that passes you recieve 1 number for each column, make sure to hit the board number before clicking your numbers to pass to the next round.

There are 3 possible bonus for your own numbers in each round. Such as

  • Joker wild card - Allows you to pick any number in the board at that specific column
  • Bag of coins - Increases your current score by 5%
  • Round booster - Gives you 2 or 3 rounds depends on the lucky.

To return to menu, you may click game logo at the top-left.

----------------------Game Patches----------------------

v0.01 - Patch (25/05/2022)

  • Play button working
  • Slot machine working

v0.02 - Patch (26/05/2022)

  • Joker wild card added
  • Bag of coins added
  • Round booster added
  • Multiplier and spider added
  • Arrow helper added
  • Green Slots added
  • Combos working

v0.03 - Patch (29/05/2022)

  • New layout
    • Stars machine
  • Highscore working
  • Text message added
  • Rates balanced
  • Auto-replay

Developed by: André Castro.
